00001 !-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00002 ! Subroutine : PostStream
00003 ! Revision   : 1.0 (2008-06-15)
00004 ! Author     : Carlos Rosales Fernandez [carlos.rosales.fernandez(at)gmail.com]
00005 !-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00014

00030 
00031  SUBROUTINE PostStream
00032 
00033 ! Common Variables
00034  USE NTypes,    ONLY : DBL
00035  USE Domain,    ONLY : inv12, ni, xmax, xmin, ymax, ymin
00036  USE FluidParams
00037  USE LBMParams
00038  IMPLICIT NONE
00039 
00040 ! Local Variables
00041  INTEGER :: i, j, ie, iw, jn, js
00042  REAL(KIND = DBL) :: Ff, Fg, GX, GY, UG, v, ux, uy, U_sq
00043  REAL(KIND = DBL) :: rhon, tau, invTau, invTau2, invCsRho
00044  REAL(KIND = DBL) :: gradPsiX, gradPsiY, gradRhoSqX, gradRhoSqY
00045  REAL(KIND = DBL) :: gradRhoXX2, gradRhoXY2, gradRhoYX2, gradRhoYY2
00046  REAL(KIND = DBL) :: gradRhoU, gradPsiU, gradRhoPsi
00047  REAL(KIND = DBL), DIMENSION(0:8) :: feq, geq, Gam, GamW
00048  REAL(KIND = DBL), DIMENSION(1:8) :: gradPsiD, gradRhoD
00049 
00050 
00051 !-------- Collision-Stream Loop ------------------------------------------------
00052  DO j = ymin, ymax
00053    DO i = xmin, xmax
00054 
00055 ! Define some local values
00056      rhon = rho(i,j)
00057      ux   = u(i,j,1)
00058      uy   = u(i,j,2)
00059      U_sq = 0.5D0*( ux*ux + uy*uy )
00060      tau  = tauL + (rhon - rhoL)*tauRhoStar
00061      invTau   = 1.D0/(1.D0 + 2.D0*tau)
00062      invTau2  = tau*invTau
00063      invCsRho = invCs_sq*rhon
00064 
00065 ! Identify neighboring cells
00066      ie = ni(i,j,1)
00067      jn = ni(i,j,2)
00068      iw = ni(i,j,3)
00069      js = ni(i,j,4)
00070 
00071 !--------- Standard Derivatives (1/12 factor embedded in kappa_12) -------------
00072 ! Gradient of the chemical potential psi
00073      gradPsiX = ( 4.D0*( psi(ie,j ) - psi(iw,j ) ) + psi(ie,jn) - psi(iw,js) &
00074               + psi(ie,js) - psi(iw,jn) )*inv12
00075 
00076      gradPsiY = ( 4.D0*( psi(i ,jn) - psi(i ,js) ) + psi(ie,jn) - psi(iw,js) &
00077               + psi(iw,jn) - psi(ie,js) )*inv12
00078 
00079 ! Gradient of the density gradient squared
00080      gradRhoSqX = 4.D0*( gradRhoSq(ie,j ) - gradRhoSq(iw,j ) )           &
00081                 + gradRhoSq(ie,jn) - gradRhoSq(iw,js) + gradRhoSq(ie,js) &
00082                 - gradRhoSq(iw,jn)
00083 
00084      gradRhoSqY = 4.D0*( gradRhoSq(i ,jn) - gradRhoSq(i ,js) )           &
00085                 + gradRhoSq(ie,jn) - gradRhoSq(iw,js) + gradRhoSq(iw,jn) &
00086                 - gradRhoSq(ie,js)
00087 
00088 ! Second derivatives of rho
00089      gradRhoXX2 = 4.D0*( gradRhoXX(ie,j ) - gradRhoXX(iw,j ) )           &
00090                 + gradRhoXX(ie,jn) - gradRhoXX(iw,js) + gradRhoXX(ie,js) &
00091                 - gradRhoXX(iw,jn)
00092 
00093      gradRhoXY2 = 4.D0*( gradRhoXY(i ,jn) - gradRhoXY(i ,js) )           &
00094                 + gradRhoXY(ie,jn) - gradRhoXY(iw,js) + gradRhoXY(iw,jn) &
00095                 - gradRhoXY(ie,js)
00096 
00097      gradRhoYX2 = 4.D0*( gradRhoXY(ie,j ) - gradRhoXY(iw,j ) )           &
00098                 + gradRhoXY(ie,jn) - gradRhoXY(iw,js) + gradRhoXY(ie,js) &
00099                 - gradRhoXY(iw,jn)
00100 
00101      gradRhoYY2 = 4.D0*( gradRhoYY(i ,jn) - gradRhoYY(i ,js) )           &
00102                 + gradRhoYY(ie,jn) - gradRhoYY(iw,js) + gradRhoYY(iw,jn) &
00103                 - gradRhoYY(ie,js)
00104 
00105 !--------- Directional derivatives ---------------------------------------------
00106 ! Gradient of the density rho
00107      gradRhoD(1) = 0.5D0*( rho(ie,j)  - rho(iw,j) )
00108      gradRhoD(2) = 0.5D0*( rho(i,jn)  - rho(i,js) )
00109      gradRhoD(3) = 0.5D0*( rho(iw,j)  - rho(ie,j) )
00110      gradRhoD(4) = 0.5D0*( rho(i,js)  - rho(i,jn) )
00111      gradRhoD(5) = 0.5D0*( rho(ie,jn) - rho(iw,js) )
00112      gradRhoD(6) = 0.5D0*( rho(iw,jn) - rho(ie,js) )
00113      gradRhoD(7) = 0.5D0*( rho(iw,js) - rho(ie,jn) )
00114      gradRhoD(8) = 0.5D0*( rho(ie,js) - rho(iw,jn) )
00115 
00116 ! Gradient of the chemical potential psi
00117      gradPsiD(1) = 0.5D0*( psi(ie,j)  - psi(iw,j) )
00118      gradPsiD(2) = 0.5D0*( psi(i,jn)  - psi(i,js) )
00119      gradPsiD(3) = 0.5D0*( psi(iw,j)  - psi(ie,j) )
00120      gradPsiD(4) = 0.5D0*( psi(i,js)  - psi(i,jn) )
00121      gradPsiD(5) = 0.5D0*( psi(ie,jn) - psi(iw,js) )
00122      gradPsiD(6) = 0.5D0*( psi(iw,jn) - psi(ie,js) )
00123      gradPsiD(7) = 0.5D0*( psi(iw,js) - psi(ie,jn) )
00124      gradPsiD(8) = 0.5D0*( psi(ie,js) - psi(iw,jn) )
00125 
00126 !--------- Equilibrium values of Gamma, and the distribution functions ---------
00127      GamW(0) = W0C*U_sq
00128      Gam(0)  = W0 - GamW(0)
00129      feq(0)  = Gam(0)*rhon
00130      geq(0)  = W0C*p(i,j) - rhon*GamW(0)
00131 
00132      GamW(1) = W1C*(ux + 1.5D0*ux*ux - U_sq )
00133      Gam(1)  = W1 + GamW(1)
00134      feq(1)  = Gam(1)*rhon
00135      geq(1)  = W1C*p(i,j) + rhon*GamW(1)
00136 
00137      GamW(2) = W1C*( uy + 1.5D0*uy*uy - U_sq )
00138      Gam(2)  = W1 + GamW(2)
00139      feq(2)  = Gam(2)*rhon
00140      geq(2)  = W1C*p(i,j) + rhon*GamW(2)
00141 
00142      GamW(3) = W1C*( -ux + 1.5D0*ux*ux - U_sq )
00143      Gam(3)  = W1 + GamW(3)
00144      feq(3)  = Gam(3)*rhon
00145      geq(3)  = W1C*p(i,j) + rhon*GamW(3)
00146 
00147      GamW(4) = W1C*( -uy + 1.5D0*uy*uy - U_sq )
00148      Gam(4)  = W1 + GamW(4)
00149      feq(4)  = Gam(4)*rhon
00150      geq(4)  = W1C*p(i,j) + rhon*GamW(4)
00151 
00152      v       = ux + uy
00153      GamW(5) = W2C*( v + 1.5D0*v*v - U_sq )
00154      Gam(5)  = W2 + GamW(5)
00155      feq(5)  = Gam(5)*rhon
00156      geq(5)  = W2C*p(i,j) + rhon*GamW(5)
00157 
00158      v      = -ux + uy
00159      GamW(6) = W2C*( v + 1.5D0*v*v - U_sq )
00160      Gam(6)  = W2 + GamW(6)
00161      feq(6)  = Gam(6)*rhon
00162      geq(6)  = W2C*p(i,j) + rhon*GamW(6)
00163 
00164      v       = -ux - uy
00165      GamW(7) = W2C*( v + 1.5D0*v*v - U_sq )
00166      Gam(7)  = W2 + GamW(7)
00167      feq(7)  = Gam(7)*rhon
00168      geq(7)  = W2C*p(i,j) + rhon*GamW(7)
00169 
00170      v       = ux - uy
00171      GamW(8) = W2C*( v + 1.5D0*v*v - U_sq )
00172      Gam(8)  = W2 + GamW(8)
00173      feq(8)  = Gam(8)*rhon
00174      geq(8)  = W2C*p(i,j) + rhon*GamW(8)
00175 
00176 ! Define directional terms that are common to all (f,g) components
00177      gradRhoU = ux*gradRhoX(i,j) + uy*gradRhoY(i,j)
00178      gradPsiU = ux*gradPsiX      + uy*gradPsiY
00179      gradRhoPsi = gradRhoU - invCsRho*gradPsiU
00180      GX = kappa_12*( gradRhoSqX - gradRhoXX2 - gradRhoXY2 )
00181      GY = kappa_12*( gradRhoSqY - gradRhoYX2 - gradRhoYY2 )
00182      UG = ux*GX + uy*GY
00183 
00184 
00185 !--------- Collision and stream for the f and g distribution functions ---------
00186      Ff = Gam(0)*gradRhoPsi
00187      Fg = GamW(0)*gradRhoU + invCs_sq*Gam(0)*UG
00188      f(i,j,0) = fbar(i,j,0) + invTau*( feq(0) - fbar(i,j,0) ) - invTau2*Ff
00189      g(i,j,0) = gbar(i,j,0) + invTau*( geq(0) - gbar(i,j,0) ) - invTau2*Fg
00190 
00191 ! Direction 1
00192      Ff = Gam(1)*( gradRhoD(1) - invCsRho*gradPsiD(1) - gradRhoPsi )
00193      Fg = GamW(1)*( gradRhoD(1) - gradRhoU ) + invCs_sq*Gam(1)*( GX - UG )
00194      f(i,j,1) = fbar(i,j,1) + invTau*( feq(1) - fbar(i,j,1) ) + invTau2*Ff
00195      g(i,j,1) = gbar(i,j,1) + invTau*( geq(1) - gbar(i,j,1) ) + invTau2*Fg
00196 
00197 ! Direction 2
00198      Ff = Gam(2)*( gradRhoD(2) - invCsRho*gradPsiD(2) - gradRhoPsi )
00199      Fg = GamW(2)*( gradRhoD(2) - gradRhoU ) + invCs_sq*Gam(2)*( GY - UG )
00200      f(i,j,2) = fbar(i,j,2) + invTau*( feq(2) - fbar(i,j,2) ) + invTau2*Ff
00201      g(i,j,2) = gbar(i,j,2) + invTau*( geq(2) - gbar(i,j,2) ) + invTau2*Fg
00202 
00203 ! Direction 3
00204      Ff = Gam(3)*( gradRhoD(3) - invCsRho*gradPsiD(3) - gradRhoPsi )
00205      Fg = GamW(3)*( gradRhoD(3) - gradRhoU ) - invCs_sq*Gam(3)*( GX + UG )
00206      f(i,j,3) = fbar(i,j,3) + invTau*( feq(3) - fbar(i,j,3) ) + invTau2*Ff
00207      g(i,j,3) = gbar(i,j,3) + invTau*( geq(3) - gbar(i,j,3) ) + invTau2*Fg
00208 
00209 ! Direction 4
00210      Ff = Gam(4)*( gradRhoD(4) - invCsRho*gradPsiD(4) - gradRhoPsi )
00211      Fg = GamW(4)*( gradRhoD(4) - gradRhoU ) - invCs_sq*Gam(4)*( GY + UG )
00212      f(i,j,4) = fbar(i,j,4) + invTau*( feq(4) - fbar(i,j,4) ) + invTau2*Ff
00213      g(i,j,4) = gbar(i,j,4) + invTau*( geq(4) - gbar(i,j,4) ) + invTau2*Fg
00214 
00215 ! Direction 5
00216      Ff = Gam(5)*( gradRhoD(5) - invCsRho*gradPsiD(5) - gradRhoPsi )
00217      Fg = GamW(5)*( gradRhoD(5) - gradRhoU ) + invCs_sq*Gam(5)*( GX + GY - UG )
00218      f(i,j,5) = fbar(i,j,5) + invTau*( feq(5) - fbar(i,j,5) ) + invTau2*Ff
00219      g(i,j,5) = gbar(i,j,5) + invTau*( geq(5) - gbar(i,j,5) ) + invTau2*Fg
00220 
00221 ! Direction 6
00222      Ff = Gam(6)*( gradRhoD(6) - invCsRho*gradPsiD(6) - gradRhoPsi )
00223      Fg = GamW(6)*( gradRhoD(6) - gradRhoU ) - invCs_sq*Gam(6)*( GX - GY + UG )
00224      f(i,j,6) = fbar(i,j,6) + invTau*( feq(6) - fbar(i,j,6) ) + invTau2*Ff
00225      g(i,j,6) = gbar(i,j,6) + invTau*( geq(6) - gbar(i,j,6) ) + invTau2*Fg
00226 
00227 ! Direction 7
00228      Ff = Gam(7)*( gradRhoD(7) - invCsRho*gradPsiD(7) - gradRhoPsi )
00229      Fg = GamW(7)*( gradRhoD(7) - gradRhoU ) - invCs_sq*Gam(7)*( GX + GY + UG )
00230      f(i,j,7) = fbar(i,j,7) + invTau*( feq(7) - fbar(i,j,7) ) + invTau2*Ff
00231      g(i,j,7) = gbar(i,j,7) + invTau*( geq(7) - gbar(i,j,7) ) + invTau2*Fg
00232 
00233 ! Direction 8
00234      Ff = Gam(8)*( gradRhoD(8) - invCsRho*gradPsiD(8) - gradRhoPsi )
00235      Fg = GamW(8)*( gradRhoD(8) - gradRhoU ) + invCs_sq*Gam(8)*( GX - GY - UG )
00236      f(i,j,8) = fbar(i,j,8) + invTau*( feq(8) - fbar(i,j,8) ) + invTau2*Ff
00237      g(i,j,8) = gbar(i,j,8) + invTau*( geq(8) - gbar(i,j,8) ) + invTau2*Fg
00238 
00239    END DO
00240  END DO
00241 
00242  RETURN
00243  END SUBROUTINE PostStream
Generated on Sun Jun 15 17:06:14 2008 for LL-2D-STD by  1.5.6
